metadata.title: VIEWPOINTS PAPERS journal of health global Aetiological role of common respiratory viruses in acute lower respiratory infections in children under five years: A systematic review and meta-analysis

abstract.original_text: Background Acute lower respiratory infection (ALRI) remains a major cause of childhood hospitalization and mortality in young children and the causal attribution of respiratory viruses in the aetiology of ALRI is unclear. We aimed to quantify the absolute effects of these viral exposures.
